channel.title: Airspace for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on Airspace for Hugo

item.title: How Project Colony Works
item.description: How does Project Colony Work Create a project See your current projects on the project page. Add Project You can simply add a project by clicking ‘Add Project’. The project creates a new colony on the etherium blockchain. Project Details Double click on a project to see its details. In the project details you can change the project name and the project description. On top you can see and add tasks to your project.
